name: Endless Inside
description: Get ready to mix scares, puzzles, hidden secrets, exploration and survive modes around dusty and dark sites with three alternate endings into one disturbing night full of strange activity, creepy giggles under the floors and spooky songs coming from old objects arround a closed Arts University.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows xp, 7, 8, 8.1, 10 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 2Gb DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 2Gb DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 8 GB available space
